summary: In 1946, a group of German POWs are mistakenly sent to a Soviet female transit prison camp and must cope with the hostility of the Soviet female inmates and guards, under the orders of cruel camp commander Pavlov.
cast: Vera Farmiga|Thomas Kretschmann|John Malkovich|Daniel Brühl|Natalie Press|Patrick Kennedy|John Lynch|Guy Flanagan|Phillip Azarov|Sergei Baryshev|Aleksandr Bolshakov|Katya Chunkova|Ingeborga Dapkunaite|Andrey Fedortsov|Natalya Fisson|Jenny Galloway|Maksim Gudkov|Oleg Kulikovich|Maria Mescheryakova|Evgeniy Mironov|Aleksandr Novin|Thekla Reuten|Fyodor Selkin|Tatyana Yakovenko|Sergey Safronov|Beverly Hotsprings|Lyudmila Shiryaeva
keywords: prisoner|boys and girls|lager|cold weather|execution by hanging
title: In Tranzit
